A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: As a Star Wars fan I'm very disappointed with this movie. Luke was completely out of character. I like Finn\, but his scenes with Rose were a complete waste of time and boring. Rose seems like a character that was just shoehorned in and wasted screen time. They made phasma useless. Leia had a very ridiculous scene I don't want to spoil. Movie felt way too marvelish
